Mobsters (1991)
Alternatieve titel: The Evil Empire

Verenigde Staten
Misdaad / Drama
104 minuten

geregisseerd door Michael Karbelnikoff
met Christian Slater, Patrick Dempsey en Richard Grieco

1917. Als drankstokers komen de jongens Luciano, Lansky en Siegel in misdadige kringen. Ze krijgen al snel grote faam en hoeven zich niet te onderwerpen aan de grote maffiabazen.

[url=http://www.moviemeter.nl/film/3395][img]http://imageshack.us/scaled/large/10/tya6.png[/img][/url]

Storyline

The story of a group of friends in turn of the century New York, from their early days as street hoods to their rise in the world of organized crime. As their crime empire expands, they have to deal with many problems, including their own differing opinions on how to run their business, the local Godfather, and the psychotic Mad Dog Coll.
